name: Kiosk
headline: WhatsApp Marketing for E-commerce
description:
At Kiosk, we help companies engage with their customers on their preferred app, WhatsApp.

In short, we blend AI agents and traditional marketing tools (Campaigns, Workflows) to generate personalised conversations at scale. Think of us like the MailChimp for WhatsApp, with a conversational AI twist ðŸ’¬

While WhatsApp is a key revenue driver in markets like India, its vast potential in Europe and Emerging Markets is still largely untapped!

founders.name: Paul Lafforgue, Founder
founders.description:
Spent 2 years in the WhatsApp team before launching Kiosk. Prior experience at Meta and McKinsey, and graduated from Ecole polytechnique and HEC Paris. 

I like to build great products with ambitious teams, and kite surfing for some adventure!

founders.name: Thomas Sohet, Founder
founders.description:
Former CTO of Yago.be with 5+ years in tech leadership. Expert in web product development and scaling startups.

Passionate about leveraging technology to solve real-world problems with smart and ambitious people.

Outside of work, I enjoy sport adventures and expeditions of all sorts.

# Engage your customers on the app they use the most.
Use Kiosk to leverage WhatsApp at scale, build meaningful relationships with clients and grow your business.

# Generate conversations
Chats have to start somewhere. Drive your website or store traffic into WhatsApp with buttons, QR codes, pop-ups, or chat bubbles.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668cf1d009ee30f57ed6f4e8/668cf1d009ee30f57ed6f5a9_Automations.svg)
AUTOMATION
# Engage your audience at scale
Generate revenue automatically with interactive sequences that feel authentic and personal. Use our conversation builder to create marketing, sales, and support flows.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668cf1d009ee30f57ed6f4e8/668cf1d009ee30f57ed6f578_Inbox.svg)
INBOX
# Manage your conversations as a team
Manage all your WhatsApp conversations in one place. Enable your whole team to answer customer questions, qualify leads, and sell products.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668cf1d009ee30f57ed6f4e8/668cf1d009ee30f57ed6f5a7_Integration.svg)
INTEGRATIONS
# Connect your business tools
Achieve more with the right information at your fingertips. Leverage your customer data by connecting WhatsApp to your favorite CRM, help desk, or marketing automation tool. Directly through Kiosk.
## And so much more
### Leverageinsights
Monitor individual and team metrics to start making measurable improvements to your WhatsApp strategy.
### Sendcampaigns
Driver higher marketing ROI with personalised WhatsApp campaigns, whether a product catalog, update,or newsletter.
### Stand out with rich content
Use native WA features like photos, voice notes, medias, buttons, lists & locations to generate higher engagement.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668cf1d009ee30f57ed6f4e8/668cf1d009ee30f57ed6f576_Notif%20Avatar%403x.png)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Kiosk**

Kiosk is an innovative startup founded in 2023, based in the vibrant city of Paris, France. Itâ€™s part of the Y Combinator Batch W24, positioning itself at the forefront of WhatsApp marketing specifically tailored for e-commerce. The mission? To help companies effectively engage with their customers using the app they already love: WhatsApp.

**What Does Kiosk Do?**

Imagine a blend of AI-powered agents and traditional marketing tools, all designed to foster personalized conversations at scale. Kiosk is like MailChimp but for WhatsAppâ€”with a conversational AI twist. This combination allows businesses to not just send messages, but to engage in meaningful, interactive conversations with customers, optimizing their marketing efforts.

While WhatsApp is already a massive revenue generator in countries like India, its potential is barely scratched in Europe and many emerging markets. Kiosk aims to bridge that gap.

**Key Features:**

1. **Personalized Marketing**: Delivering tailored experiences that cater directly to customer preferences.
2. **Automated Campaigns**: Streamlining marketing efforts through predefined workflows that feel personal.
3. **High Engagement Rates**: Enjoy click-through rates of over 35% and open rates soaring past 98%. Thatâ€™s almost unheard of.
4. **Sales Conversion**: The platform not only engages; it helps convert leads by guiding users through questions, showcasing products, and seamlessly directing them to checkout linksâ€”all within WhatsApp.

**The Team and Support Structure:**

Kiosk is a small yet dynamic team of five passionate individuals, led under the mentorship of Nicolas Dessaigne as Group Partner. This focused team setup allows for agile decision-making and rapid evolution.

**Tagline**: "Engage your customers on the app they use the most."

**Why Kiosk?** 

For e-commerce businesses, the challenge lies in meeting customers where they are, and thatâ€™s increasingly in messaging apps. Kiosk integrates easily with existing customer relationship management (CRM) tools and marketing automation systems, making it a versatile choice for companies looking to enhance their customer engagement strategies.

---

In summary, Kiosk is harnessing the power of WhatsApp to redefine customer interactions in the e-commerce landscape. With its sophisticated AI capabilities meshed into a user-friendly platform, businesses can finally tap into the personal touch that customers craveâ€”at scale. If youâ€™re ready to unleash the true potential of WhatsApp marketing, Kiosk could be your ticket. Check them out [here](https://www.kiosk.so/?utm_source=ycombinator&utm_medium=directory).
